text: Joy Jibrilu is a government official and attorney in The Bahamas. Jibrilu is the Director General of The Bahamas Ministry of Tourism & Aviation. From 2008 to 2014 Jibrilu was the Director of Investments in the Bahamas Investment Authority (BIA) in the Office of the Prime Minister. == References == Category:Living people Category:Bahamian civil servants Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Joy Jibrilu
